title: Set uploaded images as full-page backgrounds for Landing and Gratitude pages

requirements.summary: Use the uploaded Landing image as a fixed, full-viewport background behind all existing Landing content without affecting Yes/No interactions.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Landing page, the visible page background uses `/assets/3a6059bf59d32f6f27e0496b5424853a.jpg` and fills the viewport using cover/center styling.
All existing Landing page foreground UI remains visible above the background (proper stacking via z-index / positioning).
The No button remains fully interactive and continues to evade on hover/mousedown/touchstart without being blocked by the background layer.
The Yes button still works and still navigates to the Gratitude page.

file_operations.description: Replace the current inline rendering of `/assets/3a6059bf59d32f6f27e0496b5424853a.jpg` with a full-page background layer using that same static asset. Implement as a fixed/absolute background element behind all content (cover/center), ensure correct stacking (foreground above via z-index) and ensure the background layer cannot intercept pointer events so the EvasiveNoButton remains fully interactive.

Adjust the root wrapper styling so it does not visually override page-specific full-page background images (e.g., remove/neutralize the `valentine-gradient` background on the app shell while keeping the existing Landing → Gratitude navigation logic unchanged).

requirements.summary: Use the uploaded Gratitude image as a full-viewport background behind Gratitude content while preserving readability and layout.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Gratitude page, the visible page background uses `/assets/2fe29e3f61a6e53093c503c181238cdc.jpg` and fills the viewport using cover/center styling.
All existing Gratitude page content renders above the background and remains readable (e.g., via existing styling or a subtle overlay if needed).
No changes break navigation flow (Landing → Gratitude).

file_operations.description: Replace the current inline rendering of `/assets/2fe29e3f61a6e53093c503c181238cdc.jpg` with a full-page background layer using that static asset (cover/center). Ensure the background stays behind all content via z-index/positioning, and add/adjust a subtle non-interactive overlay layer if needed to maintain text readability without changing the page layout.
